thread.title: Reese Witherspoon looks so 'identical' to her teen daughter, fans can't tell them apart in this photo - Mirror Online
thread.title_full: Reese Witherspoon looks so 'identical' to her teen daughter, fans can't tell them apart in this photo - Mirror Online

author: Nicola Oakley
title: Reese Witherspoon looks so 'identical' to her teen daughter, fans can't tell them apart in this photo - Mirror Online
text:
Reese Witherspoon looks so 'identical' to her teen daughter, fans can't tell them apart in this photo Seriously... which one is Reese?! Share Reese could easily pass for her daughter's twin (Photo: Reesewitherspoon/Instagram) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Reese Witherspoon is one of those stars who has clearly been blessed with the gift of eternal youth. 
She still looks the same now as she did when she starred in Legally Blonde back in 2001. How is that even possible? 
But even the most youthful looking of mums would be lucky to look the spitting image of their teenage daughter - and Reese looks like her little girl's TWIN. 
The movie superstar posted a sweet snap of herself with daughter Ava, 17, on Instagram, showing them looking into each other's eyes. https://www.instagram.com/p/BQPji8eAost/?tagged=biglittlelies/embed 
They are both wearing beautiful dresses and both have their hair up, with incredibly similar poses, ahead of the premiere for Reese's new film Big Little Lies. 
Fans quickly rushed to comment on how they look like twins, look like "mirror images" of each other - but some were even questioning which one was Reese. 
One confused Instagram user said: "I'm convinced they're the same people like wtf" 
Has it been Photoshopped? Is it really just two photos of Reese? Reese and Ava look strikingly similar (Photo: reesewitherspoon/instagram) 
That was the theory of one Instagrammer, who said: "I thought someone had edited this to make it look like you were looking at yourself." 
Another wrote: "I can't tell which one is Reese." 
csteelejohnson commented: "Geez! You two look like twin sisters!" 
To be fair, it's pretty difficult to tell them apart, but Reese is on the right-hand side of the image, with daughter Ava on the left. 
It's not the first time people have marvelled at how alike the mum and daughter look. Ava could be Reese Witherspoon's twin 
In September 2015 when Ava - Reese's daughter with ex Ryan Philippe - turned 16, the star shared a sweet throwback snap along with one of her little girl all grown up. 
Fans couldn't believe that the image wasn't just a picture of Reese when she was a bit younger. Like us on Facebook
